attributes.action: to accept,  that the Country has no confidence in the current Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
in light of the revelations concerning MP's expenses, whose members no longer
 have the trust, confidence, or moral authority
to safeguard the safety and security of the United Kingdom, it's economic wellbeing, 
or the health, welfare and freedoms of it's inhabitants, and that the current Parliament 
should be dissolved.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
